A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just when you expect the usual way\, it turns and left you happily surprised. Still it retains many similarities to the usual roles (Poe/Han Solo\, each flirting with the female star of the episode- Kylo Ren/ Dark Vader\, both tormented and getting to their way\, the dark way\, after being betrayed and not trusted by their loved ones\, etc).  Great Rose and Luke.
